short_summary: Contract Notice: Government of Canada paper cheque forms, 2007 design
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada, Canada, PPSD Operations requires Government of Canada paper cheque forms, 2007 design, in both roll and cut sheet formats.
full_summary:
# **Security Printing and Paper Documents - Cheque Forms Tender**

## Notice Details

* **Tender Reference Number:** WS4213421512-Doc4213535856
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4213421512
* **Solicitation Amendment:** 2
* **Publication Date:** Friday, September 14, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** Friday, September 29, 2023, 2:00 pm (ET)
* **Contract Status:** Expired

## Service Requirement Details

* **Service Classification:** SRV
* **Service Name:** Security Printing and Paper Documents - Cheque Forms
* **Service Description:** Public Works and Government Services Canada requires the production of Government of Canada paper cheque forms in both roll and cut sheet formats, as per the 2007 design standard.
* **Regions of Service:** Canada

## Contract Information

* **Contract Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contract Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

## Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category:** SRV
* **Notice Type:** Advance Contract Award Notice
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

## Contact Information

* **Contract Liaison Officer:** MacConaill, Niall (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** [niall.macconaill@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:niall.macconaill@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Note: I made several changes to rephrase the text in a more professional manner:

* Simplified sentence structure and wording to improve clarity
* Standardized formatting for better readability
* Eliminated redundant or unnecessary information
* Corrected minor errors in grammar and punctuation
* Converted French text to Romanization for better indexing and searchability
